Name: OrbWars
About the game: Key Features Meet the OrbWarriors: 4 heroic toy robots for you to pick and choose from Cooperative campaign: Play PvE together with up to 3 friends in a story about overcoming your own fears. Half way there: With the Early Access Version of OrbWars we will release 2 worlds with more than 20 hand-crafted levels for you to play. But it gets even better: 2 more worlds are already in production and will be added for the full version lauch of OrbWars! Intense Versus gameplay: Challenge your friends to intense, fast paced rounds of 1v1 or 2v2 combat. 2 Versus Gamemodes: Fight your friends to the end in our deatthmatch mode Last Toy Standing or race past them in Flag Attack, our very own spin on the classic Capture the Flag formula. Spice up your game: Pick up Boost Capsules and enhance your Orb attacks with 2 explosive effects - more coming soon! Local or online: Play OrbWars with and gainst your friends, wether you're 4 people bunched together on one couch in front of a TV or sitting on 4 separate PCs halfway across the world from each other. Have you ever been afraid of a monster in the dark? Elusive, hiding under your bed or inside the closet, skulking out of view whenever your parents shine a light. But you know it's there, lurking in the shadows, just barely out of sight. What if that monster is real? That monster is very real for 8 year old Elias. It's coming for him. It is waiting, in the darkness, in it's stronghold. Waiting, and plotting and biding it's time, slowly exerting it's influence all throughout his bedroom. Of course his parents don't believe him, so there's only one option left: Call in the OrbWarriors! Take control of Alpha, Beta, Gamma or Omega and fight off the evil lurking in the Dark. Set in a world in which reality and imagination slowly collide, team up with your friends and help Elias conquer his fears as you fight back the Monster in the Dark and it's ever increasing army of henchmen. Master the Orb, the titular weapon of the OrbWarriors, and it's unique form of combat. Modify your Orbs abilities further through the use of Boost Capsules and collect rare Power Chips to unlock your full potential and customize your Orb Warrior to fit your playstyle. Become the mightiest OrbWarrior to ever exist and show your friends who's boss: Battle it out with them in the versus mode 'Last Toy Standing' and show off your skills or prove your prowess and dexterity by scoring on them in the versus mode Flag Attack.
